definitions.definition: a person, object, or place selected as the aim of an attack.
examples: prey, quarry, game, kill eagles can spot their target from half a mile

definitions.definition: a mark or point at which someone fires or aims, especially a round or rectangular board marked with concentric circles used in archery or shooting.
examples: mark, bullseye, goal targets at a range of 200 meters

definitions.definition: an objective or result toward which efforts are directed.
examples: the car met its sales target in record time

definitions.definition: an idealization of the articulation of a speech sound, with reference to which actual utterances can be described.
a person or thing against whom criticism or abuse is or may be directed.
examples: victim, butt, recipient, focus, object, subject she was the target for a wave of abuse

definitions.definition: a small, round shield or buckler.
select as an object of attention or attack.
examples: two men were targeted by the attackers
synonyms: fire at "he was targeted by a gunman"

examples: a significant nuclear capability targeted on the US
synonyms: focus on "the product is targeted at a specific market"
